features.featureTitle: Save the uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image as a static frontend asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png and replace every occurrence of the 'AR' text/initials placeholder logo in the site (navigation bar in PortfolioNav.tsx, hero section in HeroSection.tsx, footer in App.tsx, and any other location rendering the 'AR' mark) with an tag referencing this static asset. Set appropriate alt text ('Vayutaksha Consultancy') and size the image to fit naturally in each context (e.g., ~40â€“48px height in the nav, larger in the hero).
